actions.name: Moody
actions.description: Effect: At the end of the user's Activations, the user rolls 2d8. The first d8 sets the default Stage of the rolled stat by +2. The second d8 sets the default Stage of the rolled stat to -1. These chance each time this Ability activates. 1- ATK, 2- DEF, 3- SPATK, 4- SPDEF, 5- SPD, 6- ACC, 7- EVA, 8- User Choice.

system.description: Effect: At the end of the user's Activations, the user rolls 2d8. The first d8 sets the default Stage of the rolled stat by +2.
